creditline: Gift of George R. A. Johnson and Emily Johnson in honor of Jason T. Busch, Associate Curator, Decorative Arts (2000-2006)
markings: on side of cup, stamped: two untranslated Arabic marks; on side of cover, stamped: two untranslated Arabic marks; on top of saucer, stamped: two untranslated Arabic marks; on bottom of saucer, incised: possible Arabic inscription; on handle of cup, stamped: untranslated inscription
title: Covered tasse and saucer
